experiences.title: Machine Learning Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Frenzy Labs, Inc.
workDescription: Developed a software pipeline using HuggingFace’s DistilBERT model and Tensorflow to classify fashion products.
Integrated a system using NLP augmentation library to handle irrelevant sentences from the product metadata to reduce misclassification. This led to an increase in classification accuracy by 10%.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.subtitle: M/S Ram Niwas & Sons, India
workDescription: Developed an e-commerce web application based on NodeJS and React as part of a team which helped in increasing sales by 15%.
Collected, analyzed and interpreted patterns within the client data to make suggestions about sales and marketing.
Integrated Health checks and fault tolerance to help in maintenance of the web application.

experiences.title: Database Engineer
experiences.subtitle: S. P. Associates, India
workDescription: Managed database using MYSQL to update daily sales and records reducing turnaround time on inventory by 20%.
